wikipedia_page.main: David Graham (13 March 1922 – 17 July 2009) was a Northern Irish cricketer. A right-handed batsman and right-arm fast-medium bowler, he played twice for the Ireland cricket team in 1948, making his debut against Yorkshire in June, and then playing a first-class match against Scotland the following month. Graham was born in Belfast in March 1922 and died in Harrow, London in July 2009 at the age of 87.
